description: This contains the locations for which a Transfer Center contact is an admitting provider.

columns.name: COMM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the communication record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: CNCT_ADMT_LOC_ID
columns.description: This indicates the locations for which the associated contact is an admitting provider.
